    • Constructor Detail

      • Pet

        public Pet(java.lang.String petName)
        Initializes a standard pet. All pets start being 10% Tired, 20% Hungry, 50% Happy and bladder 20% full.
        Parameters:
        petName - The name that will be assigned to the pet.

    • Method Detail

      • getToyUse

        public double getToyUse()
        returns how much durability a pet uses by playing with a toy
        Returns:
        Double value of durability used by pet playing with a toy

      • adjustHealth

        public void adjustHealth(double amount)
        Adjusts the pets health by the amount entered. If health is above 100, it is set to 100
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount the pets health is changed by

      • getHealth

        public double getHealth()

        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • getStats

        public java.lang.String getStats()
        Prints a summary of the pet. This includes calls to getName(), getTiredness(), getHunger(), getThirst, getHappiness() and getBladder().

      • adjustHunger

        public void adjustHunger(double amount)
        Adjusts the pets hunger by the amount entered into the function.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount the hunger of the pet is to be adjusted by. Negative value to decrease. If hunger is above 100 or below 0 it is set to 100 or 0 respectively.

      • adjustThirst

        public void adjustThirst(double amount)
        Adjusts the pets thirst by the amount entered into the function.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount the hunger of the pet is to be adjusted by. Negative value to decrease. If thirst is above 100 or below 0 it is set to 100 or 0 respectively.

      • adjustHappiness

        public void adjustHappiness(double amount)
        Adjusts the pets happiness by the amount entered into the function.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount the happiness of the pet is to be adjusted by. Negative value to decrease. If happiness is above 100 or below 0 it is set to 100 or 0 respectively.

      • adjustTiredness

        public void adjustTiredness(double amount)
        Adjusts the pets tiredness by the amount entered into the function.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount the tiredness of the pet is to be adjusted by. Negative value to decrease. If tiredness is above 100 or below 0 it is set to 100 or 0 respectively.

      • adjustBladder

        public void adjustBladder(double amount)
        Adjusts the pets bladder by the amount entered into the function.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount the bladder of the pet is to be adjusted by. Negative value to decrease. If bladder is above 100 or below 0 it is set to 100 or 0 respectively.

      • goToSleep

        public boolean goToSleep()
        Puts a pet to sleep and adjust the hunger accordingly.
        Returns:
        If the pet successfully went to sleep.

      • goToilet

        public boolean goToilet()
        Sets the pets bladder to 5% full

      • readDescription

        public java.lang.String readDescription(java.lang.String type)
        reads in the description of the pet from the file desctipt.txt and returns it.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of pet to return the description of.
        Returns:
        The description of the pet as a string.
